abstract: In Iowa on Sunday, Mr. Sanders spoke of Mr. David’s impersonation of him on Saturday Night Live: “I think we’re gonna put him up on the stage at our next rally – let him do it, rather than me. He does it better than I do.”

headline.main: Bernie Sanders Praises Larry David’s Bernie Sanders

snippet: In Iowa on Sunday, Mr. Sanders spoke of Mr. David’s impersonation of him on Saturday Night Live: “I think we’re gonna put him up on the stage at our next rally – let him do it, rather than me. He does it better than I do.”
